titles.title: Akuyaku Reijou to Akuyaku Reisoku ga, Deatte Koi ni Ochita nara: Nanashi no Seirei to Keiyaku shite Oidasareta Reijou wa, Kyou mo Reisoku to Kisoiatteiru you desu
If the Villainess and the Villain Were to Meet and Fall in Love
悪役令嬢と悪役令息が、出逢って恋に落ちたなら ～名無しの精霊と契約して追い出された令嬢は、今日も令息と競い合っているようです～
If the Villainess and Villain Met and Fell in Love

title: Akuyaku Reijou to Akuyaku Reisoku ga, Deatte Koi ni Ochita nara: Nanashi no Seirei to Keiyaku shite Oidasareta Reijou wa, Kyou mo Reisoku to Kisoiatteiru you desu
title_english: If the Villainess and Villain Met and Fell in Love
title_japanese: 悪役令嬢と悪役令息が、出逢って恋に落ちたなら ～名無しの精霊と契約して追い出された令嬢は、今日も令息と競い合っているようです～
title_synonyms: If the Villainess and the Villain Were to Meet and Fall in Love
synopsis:
Contracted with a no-name spirit, Brigitte Meidell is a disappointment to her noble family and the mockery of her peers at the Otoleanna Academy of Magic—except for one. Yuri Aurealis is intelligent, handsome...and oh so arrogant. He's made enemies of the same people as Brigitte, meaning the two should get along just fine. However, his boorishness accidentally sparks a rivalry between them. It's a competition that has the potential to bring the two closer than they ever thought...!

(Source: Yen Press)
background: Akuyaku Reijou to Akuyaku Reisoku ga, Deatte Koi ni Ochita nara: Nanashi no Seirei to Keiyaku shite Oidasareta Reijou wa, Kyou mo Reisoku to Kisoiatteiru you desu has been published in English as If the Villainess and Villain Met and Fell in Love by Yen Press since February 20, 2024.
